13.Name: DMG Amplification
13.Desc: Provides DMG Amplification for a specific Resonator in the team

23.Name: Resonance Liberation DMG Amplification
23.Desc: Provides Resonance Liberation DMG Amplification for a specific Resonator in the team

33.Name: Tune Rupture Response
33.Desc: Deals Tune Rupture DMG to targets

34.Name: Tune Break Boost
34.Desc: Provides additional Tune Break Boost for a specific Resonator in the team

36.Name: Tune Strain Response
36.Desc: Gains total DMG increase from Tune Break Boost

Skill.Name: Chroma Drift
Skill.Desc:
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack</color></size>
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} or hold Normal Attack to perform up to 3 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Mid-air Attack</color></size>
Consume STA to perform Plunging Attack, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Dodge Counter</color></size>
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack right after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Spark Collision</color></size>
With full <color=Highlight><te href=150905>Overflow</te></color> in the <color=Highlight><te href=150901>Optical Sampling Stage</te></color>, hold Normal Attack to enter a charging state.
During this state, 15 points of <color=Highlight><te href=150905>Overflow</te></color> will be converted to 12.5% of <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color> every 0.2s. Lynae is immune to interruption and and takes {0} less DMG.
Upon releasing Normal Attack, Lynae casts Spark Collision of varying strengths based on the ratio of <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color>, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> considered Basic Attack DMG.
Spark Collision Lv. 1: <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color> <50%
Spark Collision Lv. 2: 50% â‰¤ <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color> < 100%
Spark Collision Lv. 3: <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color>=100%
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack</color></size>
While in <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color>, <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> is replaced with <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack</color>.
Perform up to 5 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.
With 120 points of <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color>, <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack Stage 1 &4</color> track enemies in a greater distance.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Ground Heavy Attack</color></size>
While in <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade</color>, hold Normal Attack on the ground to cast this skill. Consume STA to continuously attack the target, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>, considered Basic Attack DMG. Release to cast <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Graffiti Blast</color>, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>, considered Basic Attack DMG.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Mid-air Heavy Attack</color></size>
Gains 1 extra charge while on the ground.
While in <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade</color>, hold Normal Attack in mid-air to cast this skill. Consume STA to attack the target, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>, considered Basic Attack DMG.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Mid-air Attack</color></size>
While in <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade</color>, <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack</color> is replaced with <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Mid-air Attack</color>.
Consume STA to perform Plunging Attack, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>, considered Basic Attack DMG.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Dodge Counter</color></size>
While in <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade</color>, <color=Highlight>Dodge Counter</color> is replaced with <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Dodge Counter</color>.
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack right after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.
While in <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade</color>, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Normal Attack shortly after casting this skill to cast <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack Stage 2</color>.
Skill.SimpleDesc:
<size=40><color=Title>Charging State/color></size>
While in <color=Highlight>Default State</color> with full <color=Highlight>Overflow</color>, hold Normal Attack to enter a charging state and then release to dash toward the target.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Roller Skate Heavy Attack</color></size>
While in <color=Highlight>Roller Skate State</color>, hold Normal Attack on the ground to continuously cast Ground Heavy Attack and deliver a finisher blow upon release; Hold Normal Attack in mid-air to cast Mid-air Heavy Attack.

14.Name: Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack Stage 1 DMG

15.Name: Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack Stage 2 DMG

16.Name: Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack Stage 3 DMG

17.Name: Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack Stage 4 DMG

18.Name: Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack Stage 5 DMG

23.Name: Kaleidoscopic Parade - Ground Heavy Attack DMG

28.Name: Kaleidoscopic Parade - Mid-air Heavy Attack DMG

35.Name: Kaleidoscopic Parade - Ground Heavy Attack STA Cost Per Strike

36.Name: Kaleidoscopic Parade - Mid-air Heavy Attack STA Cost

37.Name: Kaleidoscopic Parade - Mid-air Attack STA Cost

Skill.Name: Lynae-Style Palettes
Skill.Desc:
<size=40><color=Title>Lynae-Style Palettes</color></size>
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Resonance Skill to deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>. 
While in <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color>, hold Resonance Skill to attack the target, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> and exiting the <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color>. 
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack with a certain time after this skill to cast <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 2</color>.
Lynae-Style Palettes and Additive Color <color=Highlight>share a cooldown</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Additive Color</color></size>
During <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color>, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Resonance Skill on the ground to attack the target, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.
Within a certain time after this skill is cast, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Normal Attack to cast <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack Stage 2</color>.
Lynae-Style Palettes and Additive Color <color=Highlight>share a cooldown</color>.
Skill.SimpleDesc:
<size=40><color=Title>Resonance Skill</color></size>
Deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Roller Skate Resonance Skill</color></size>
Deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.

Skill.Name: Prismatic Overblast
Skill.Desc:
Deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>. During this skill, all nearby Resonators in the team gain {0} All-DMG Bonus increase for {1}s.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack - To a Vivid Tomorrow!</color></size>
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack shortly after casting <color=Highlight>Resonance Liberation - Prismatic Overblast</color> to cast <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - To a Vivid Tomorrow!</color>, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>, considered Basic Attack DMG.
Skill.SimpleDesc:
Deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>. During this skill, all nearby Resonators in the team gain All-DMG Bonus increase.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Motorbike Chain Attack</color></size>
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack shortly after casting <color=Highlight>Resonance Liberation</color> to cast a chain attack on motorbike.

Skill.Name: Colors Never Fade!
Skill.Desc:
After casting <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Visual Impact</color>, Lynae leaves <color=Highlight><te href=150904>Spray Paint</te></color> on the ground and continuously inflicts <color=Highlight><te href=150903>Photochromic Flux</te></color> on targets within the <color=Highlight><te href=150904>Spray Paint</te></color> for {1}s, triggered once every {0}s. When <color=Highlight><te href=150904>Spray Paint</te></color> is on the ground, switching to another type of <color=Highlight>Spectral Analysis</color> doesn't affect the <color=Highlight><te href=150903>Photochromic Flux</te></color> effects inflicted by the <color=Highlight><te href=150904>Spray Paint</te></color>.
<size=10></size>
With Lynae in the team, expedition motorbike's Energy Tank expands by 600 points. Lynae enters <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color> automatically while on the expedition motorbike and restore 20% of <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color>.
Skill.SimpleDesc:
After casting <color=Highlight>Enhanced Roller Skate Plunge Attack</color>, Lynae leaves <color=Highlight>Spray Paint</color> on the ground and continuously inflicts <color=Highlight>Photochromic Flux</color> on targets within the range of the <color=Highlight>Spray Paint</color>.
<size=10></size>
Expedition motorbike's Energy Tank is increased. Lynae automatically enters <color=Highlight>roller skating state</color>  when driving the expedition motorbike.

Skill.Name: Adaptive Optics: Everyday Applications
Skill.Desc:
Casting <color=Highlight>Intro Skill - Taste My Colors!</color> increases Lynae's <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> by {1} in the next {0}s. 
<size=10></size>
During <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color>, if Lynae isn't in combat, dodging without directional input grants her <color=Highlight>Optic Camo</color> for {2}s, which will be removed when Lynae casts any skill other than dodging or is switched off the field. Performing environmental, gameplay or functional interactions, or entering combat removes the <color=Highlight>Optic Camo</color>. With <color=Highlight>Optic Camo</color>, Lynae may enter an enemy's aggro range without triggering combat.
Skill.SimpleDesc:
Casting <color=Highlight>Intro Skill </color> increases Lynae's <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.increase.
<size=10></size>
While in <color=Highlight>Roller Skate State</color>, dodging without directional input will apply <color=Highlight>Optic Camo</color>. With <color=Highlight>Optic Camo</color>, Lynae may enter an enemy's aggro range without engaging.

Skill.Name: Time to Show Some Colors!
Skill.Desc: Deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> and recover {0} points of <color=Highlight><te href=150905>Overflow</te></color>, inflicting <color=Highlight><te href=150903>Photochromic Flux</te></color> on targets hit.
Skill.SimpleDesc: Recover <color=Highlight>Overflow</color> and inflict <color=Highlight>Photochromic Flux</color> on targets.

29.Name: Time to Show Some Colors! DMG

Skill.Name: Chromaticity Modeling
Skill.Desc:
<size=40><color=Title>Optical Sampling Stage</color></size>
Lynae is in <color=Highlight><te href=150901>Optical Sampling Stage</te></color> by default. While in this state, casting Basic Attack,  Lynae-Style Palettes, Mid-air Attack, and Dodge Counter recovers <color=Highlight><te href=150905>Overflow</te></color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Kaleidoscopic Parade</color></size>
Casting <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Spark Collision</color> sends Lynae into <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color>. In this state, Lynae continuously recovers <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color> while moving on the ground or casting certain skills. Lynae will not Walk during this state and her Running and Sprinting will be replaced by the faster <color=Highlight>Free Skating</color> and <color=Highlight>Speed Skating</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack - Polychrome Leap </color></size>
While in <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color>, with at least 1/3 of the max <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color>, Jump is replaced by <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Polychrome Leap</color>.
Consume 1/3 of the max <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color> to deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>, considered Basic Attack DMG. Inflict <color=Highlight><te href=150903>Photochromic Flux</te></color> on targets hit. Successful Dodges can be triggered during this skill. While airborne, <color=Highlight>Polychrome Leap</color> chains up to 3 stages.
While in combat, each stage of <color=Highlight>Polychrome Leap</color> cast recovers 1 point of <color=Highlight><te href=150907>True Color</te></color>.
Within a certain time after <color=Highlight>Polychrome Leap - Stage 1</color> {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Normal Attack on the ground to cast <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack Stage 2</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack - Iridescent Splash</color></size>
During <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color>, when Lynae is in mid-air, holding 3 points of <color=Highlight><te href=150907>True Color</te></color>, if <color=Highlight>Visual Impact</color> is on cooldown, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Normal Attack or Resonance Skill to deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>, considered Basic Attack DMG, and inflict <color=Highlight><te href=150903>Photochromic Flux</te></color> on targets hit.
This skill consumes 3 points of <color=Highlight><te href=150907>True Color</te></color>.
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack within a certain time after this skill is to cast <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack Stage 2</color> 
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack - Visual Impact</color></size>
During <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color>, when Lynae is in mid-air, holding 3 points of <color=Highlight><te href=150907>True Color</te></color>, if this skill is not on cooldown, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Normal Attack or Resonance Skill to deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>, considered Basic Attack DMG, and inflict <color=Highlight><te href=150903>Photochromic Flux</te></color> on targets hit.
This skill consumes 3 points of <color=Highlight><te href=150907>True Color</te></color> and grants all nearby Resonators in the team {0} points of Tune Break Boost for {1}s.
{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack within a certain time after this skill is to cast <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack Stage 2</color> 
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack - Spectral Analysis</color></size>
Inflict <color=Highlight><te href=150903>Photochromic Flux</te></color> when hitting a target with <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Polychrome Leap</color>, <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Iridescent Splash</color>, <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Visual Impact</color> and <color=Highlight>Intro Skill - Time to Show Some Colors!</color>.
Lynae can switch between <color=Highlight>Spectral Analysis - Tune Rupture</color> and <color=Highlight>Spectral Analysis - Tune Strain</color>:
- When in <color=Highlight>Spectral Analysis - Tune Rupture</color>, <color=Highlight><te href=150903>Photochromic Flux</te></color> inflicts <color=Highlight><te href=100002>Tune Rupture - Shifting</te></color> on targets for 25s..
- When in <color=Highlight>Spectral Analysis - Tune Strain</color>, <color=Highlight><te href=150903>Photochromic Flux</te></color> inflicts <color=Highlight><te href=100003>Tune Strain - Shifting</te></color> on targets for 25s.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Tune Rupture Response - Spectral Analysis</color></size>
Deal an instance of <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>, considered Tune Rupture DMG, to targets within range affected by <color=Highlight><te href=100004>Tune Rupture - Interfered</te></color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Overflow</color></size>
Lynae can hold up to 120 points of Overflow.
While in <color=Highlight><te href=150901>Optical Sampling Stage</te></color>, casting Basic Attack,  Lynae-Style Palettes, Mid-air Attack, and Dodge Counter recovers <color=Highlight><te href=150905>Overflow</te></color>.
When <color=Highlight><te href=150905>Overflow</te></color> is full, <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Spark Collision</color> becomes available.
Exiting <color=Highlight><te href=150901>Optical Sampling Stage</te></color> removes all <color=Highlight><te href=150905>Overflow</te></color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Lumiflow</color></size>
Lynae can hold up to 120 points of Lumiflow.
During <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color>:
- Restore 20% of <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color> per second while Lynae is moving on the ground or casting <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Basic Attack</color>, <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Ground Heavy Attack</color>, <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Mid-air Heavy Attack</color>, <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Mid-air Attack</color>, <color=Highlight>Additive Color</color>, Dodge, Intro Skill, or <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - To a Vivid Tomorrow!</color>.
- <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color> starts to deplete by 20% per second when Lynae is standing still or off the field, or a certain time after the skills listed above is cast.
- <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color> will neither recover nor deplete while Lynae is not in any of the states described above.
Exiting <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color> removes all <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color>.
With 120 points of <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color>, Lynae's roller skating <color=Highlight>speed further increases</color> at the cost of STA over time.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>True Color</color></size>
Lynae can hold up to 3 points of True Color.
During combat, each time <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Polychrome Leap</color> is cast, gain 1 point of <color=Highlight><te href=150907>True Color</te></color>. With 3 points of <color=Highlight><te href=150907>True Color</te></color>, <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Iridescent Splash</color> and <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Visual Impact</color> become available.
Exiting <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color> removes all <color=Highlight><te href=150907>True Color</te></color>.
Skill.SimpleDesc:
<size=40><color=Title>Roller Skate State</color></size>
After casting the <color=Highlight>Charging State</color>, Lynae enters <color=Highlight>Roller Skate State</color> and unlocks new moves.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack - Polychrome Leap</color></size>
During <color=Highlight>Roller Skate State</color>, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Jump and consume 1/3 of the max <color=Highlight>Lumiflow</color> to perform up to 3 stages of leap attack, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>. Inflict <color=Highlight>Photochromic Flux</color> on targets hit.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Roller Skate Plunge Attack Combo</color></size>
During <color=Highlight>Roller Skate State</color>, while in mid-air with max <color=Highlight>True Color</color>, if <color=Highlight>Enhanced Roller Skate Plunge Attack</color> is not on cooldown, cast <color=Highlight>Enhanced Roller Skate Plunge Attack</color>, otherwise cast <color=Highlight> Roller Skate Plunge Attack</color> instead. Inflict <color=Highlight>Photochromic Flux</color> on targets hit.
Casting <color=Highlight>Enhanced Roller Skate Plunge Attack</color> increases the Tune Break Boost for all nearby Resonators in the team.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Spectral Analysis</color></size>
Inflict <color=Highlight>Tune Rupture - Shifting</color> or <color=Highlight>Tune Strain - Shifting</color> on targets based on the current mode of <color=Highlight>Spectral Analysis</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Overflow</color></size>
While in <color=Highlight>Default State</color>, attacks recover <color=Highlight>Overflow</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Lumiflow</color></size>
While in <color=Highlight>Roller Skate State</color>, moving or attacks restore 20% of <color=Highlight>Lumiflow</color> per second.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>True Color</color></size>
While in combat, each <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Polychrome Leap</color> grants 1 point of <color=Highlight>True Color</color>.

32.Name: Tune Rupture Response - Spectral Analysis DMG

42.Name: Roller Skating STA Cost Per Sec at Max Overflow

Skill.Name: Let's Hit the Road!
Skill.Desc:
Attack the target and deal {0} <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>. The next incoming Resonator gain  {1} All-DMG Amplification and {2} Resonance Liberation DMG Amplification for 14s or until they are switched out.
Lynae leaves the <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color> state upon casting Outro Skill.
Skill.SimpleDesc:
Attack the target and deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>. The next incoming Resonator has their All DMG and Resonance Liberation DMG Amplified or until they are switched out.
Casting Outro Skill exits <color=Highlight>skating mode</color>.

Skill.Name: Spectral Analysis
Skill.Desc: Lynae can inflict Tune Rupture - Shifting or Tune Strain - Shifting on targets. Lynae can respond to Tune Rupture - Interfered and Tune Strain - Interfered. Responding to Tune Rupture - Interfered: When Resonators in the team hit a target affected by Tune Rupture - Interfered, Lynae casts Tune Rupture Response - Spectral Analysis. Each target can be damaged by this skill up to once every 8s. Responding to Tune Strain - Interfered: For each stack of Tune Strain - Interfered on the target, each point of Lynae's Tune Break Boost increases her total DMG against that target by {1}. When Lynae's nearby in the team, the target's max stack limit of Tune Strain - Interfered is increased by 1. When the target's Off-Tuning Level is full, Lynae can cast on the target.
Skill.SimpleDesc:
Lynae can inflict <color=Highlight>Tune Rupture - Shifting</color> or <color=Highlight>Tune Strain - Shifting</color> on targets.
Lynae can respond to <color=Highlight>Rupturous Tune Break</color> and <color=Highlight>Strained Tune Break</color>.

1.Name: Days to be Painted Like a Canvas
1.Desc:
The DMG Multiplier of <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Polychrome Leap</color> is increased by {0}.
The duration of <color=Highlight><te href=150904>Spray Paint</te></color> is increased by {1}. Targets within the range of <color=Highlight><te href=150904>Spray Paint</te></color> are pulled in towards the center every {2}s.
Lynae is now immune to interruptions during <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Polychrome Leap</color> and <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Visual Impact</color>.
During <color=Highlight><te href=150901>Optical Sampling Stage</te></color>, after staying out of combat for {3}s, restore {4} points of <color=Highlight><te href=150905>Overflow</te></color>.

2.Name: Into Lights' Vanishing Point
2.Desc:
Gain {0} All-DMG Amplification.
<size=10></size>
Casting Outro Skill grants the incoming Resonator {1} All-DMG Amplification for {2}s or until the Resonator is switched out.

3.Name: For One Brilliant Moment
3.Desc:
The DMG Multiplier of <color=Highlight>Visual Impact</color> is increased by {4}.
With <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color> â‰¥ 120 points. Lynae gains 1 stack of <color=Highlight>Premixed Hue</color> every {0}s, up to {1} stacks. Each stack of <color=Highlight>Premixed Hue</color> increases the Spectro DMG dealt through <color=Highlight>Additive Color</color> by {2}. When <color=Highlight>Additive Color</color> ends, remove all stacks of <color=Highlight>Premixed Hue</color>. Lynae loses a stack of <color=Highlight>Premixed Hue</color> every {3}s once <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color> is below 120 points.
<color=Highlight>If Lynae is not in combat, Premixed Hue replenishes at a doubled rate and depletes at a halfed rate</color>.

5.Name: Visions of a Future Unbound
5.Desc: The DMG Multiplier of <color=Highlight>Resonance Liberation - Prismatic Overblast</color> is increased by {0}.

6.Name: Painted in My True Color
6.Desc:
Each time <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Cruise - Ground Heavy Attack</color> or <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Mid-air Heavy Attack</color> is cast, Lynae gains 1 stack of <color=Highlight>Color of Soul</color>, up to {2} stacks. Each stack of <color=Highlight>Color of Soul</color> increases the DMG dealt through <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Polychrome Leap</color> and <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Visual Impact</color> by {3}. After casting <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Polychrome Leap</color> or <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Visual Impact</color>, all stacks of <color=Highlight>Color of Soul</color> are removed.
Casting <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Polychrome Leap</color> resets the charges of <color=Highlight>Kaleidoscopic Parade - Mid-air Heavy Attack</color>.
Lynae now stays in <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color> after casting <color=Highlight>Outro Skill - Let's Hit the Road!</color>.
The <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color> upper limit is increased from {0} to {1}. Lynae's roller skating speed at max limit further increases.
If Intro Skill is cast during <color=Highlight><te href=150902>Kaleidoscopic Parade</te></color>, restore {4} <color=Highlight><te href=150906>Lumiflow</te></color>.

81001509.Name: Lynae
81001509.BgDescription: The Startorch Academy's prep uniform, "slightly modified" for Lynae's taste, tailored to minimize drag at high speeds. And yes, the splashes of color are a crucial part of the design!
